string.name: by_author_on_date
string.comment:
1 is the author, 2 is the date. So the default format will be shown as
John Smith, Saturday, 9 January 2021 15:49
if better for other language, it can be changed. For example
%1$s on %2$s:
John Smith on Saturday, 9 January 2021 15:49

string.name: on_date
string.comment: 1 is the date. Used in the feed view.
